analysis: The project currently has a basic HTML structure with some CSS and JavaScript. The event 'mordenui-chrismas-mobileresponsive' suggests a need for a Christmas-themed, mobile-responsive UI. The existing files show a foundation but lack festive elements and proper mobile responsiveness.

Implement a mobile-responsive navigation menu with a hamburger icon, ensuring it is user-friendly on smaller screens.
